triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Data mining is the central focus of the conference, involving extraction of knowledge from large and complex datasets.

triples.name: Statistics
triples.relevance: Statistical foundations form the theoretical basis for the data mining techniques and analysis methods discussed.

triples.name: Data visualization
triples.relevance: Powerful visualization technologies are essential for presenting and understanding patterns in complex datasets.

triples.name: User interface
triples.relevance: User-friendly interface systems enable scientists, engineers, and physicians to effectively use data mining tools.

triples.name: Program optimization
triples.relevance: Performance optimization is crucial for implementing efficient algorithms that can handle large-scale datasets.
